channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Saturday Mash-Up! Live
channel.desc: Joe, Shereen, Stanley and Kia throw a Halloween party with Philip Green and the stars of Jamie Johnson FC.?Kristen Wiig plays truth or dare, while Stanley visits a haunted hotel.?Get ready for a huge Joe v Shereen challenge, and there?s two episodes of SpongeBob Squarepants. Saturday Mash-Up is totally live? so anything can happen.
